title: Pedestrian hit by SUV in Terrace
content_html:
A woman was reportedly struck by a vehicle at the intersection of Kalum Street and Park Avenue in Terrace on the evening of Nov. 3.

Terrace RCMP say the incident occurred around 9:15 p.m. when an orange Ford SUV, travelling north on Kalum Street, turned left onto Park Avenue and struck the pedestrian. The woman was not seriously injured.

Investigators are seeking witnesses or any local businesses that may have captured the incident on surveillance cameras. Anyone with information is asked to contact the Terrace RCMP detachment at 250-638-7400.
captions: Terrace RCMP are looking for the driver in a hit and run that occurred in Terrace on Nov. 3, 2025. (File photo)
